class gstLineIntersectionInfoFirst_ParamNormal : public gstLineIntersectionInfoFirst_Param

First intersection along line with object including parametric value (t1) of line where first intersection occurs and normal of surface at point of intersection.

From header file: gstLineIntersectionInfoFirst_ParamNormal.h

Functions
getNormal Returns value of intersection normal.
normal Returns value of intersection normal.
setNormal Sets value of intersection normal to normal.
